      • uploadFile

        java.lang.String uploadFile​(org.apache.http.client.HttpClient p_client,
                            java.lang.String p_strUri,
                            de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IOperationFile p_file,
                            boolean p_bReplace)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Used to upload smaller files (up to 4 MB).
        Parameters:
        p_client - The client.
        p_strUri - The folder endpoint URI.
        p_file - The file.
        p_bReplace - True, if file should be replaced.
        Returns:
        The OneDrive item ID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If request fails.

                                     de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IOperationFile p_file)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Used to upload large files (at least 4 MB) in chunks. This method resumes the upload if a chunk failed.
        Parameters:
        p_client - The client.
        p_strUri - The folder endpoint URI.
        p_file - The file.
        Returns:
        The OneDrive item ID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If request fails.

      • getDriveItem

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> getDriveItem​(org.apache.olingo.client.api.ODataClient p_client,

                                                                                    boolean p_bFolder)
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Get file or folder item from OneDrive.
        Parameters:
        p_client - The client.
        p_strUri - The folder endpoint URI.
        p_bFolder - If true, returns files in folder otherwise returns single file by item ID.
        Returns:
        Map of drive item ID and item properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If request fails.

      • addPermission

                                         java.lang.String p_addPermissionUri,
                                         PermissionRequest p_permissionToAdd)
        Add a permission to an existing item.
        Parameters:
        p_client - The odata client.
        p_addPermissionUri - The uri to access the item.
        p_permissionToAdd - The information about the permission, which will be added to the item.
        Returns:
        A list of all permissions of the item the permission was added to.

      • getSitesOfUser

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>>> getSitesOfUser​(org.apache.olingo.client.api.ODataClient p_client)
        Get all sites of the current user. The result is a map with all sites as keys and a list of the root folders of the respective site.
        Parameters:
        p_client - The odata client.
        Returns:
        A map of all sites as key with a list of root folders as value.
